group_1.textRight: ...Yes, I'm pretty sure we all stayed at my house.
So this dream we find ourselves in now is the@one we all had that night?

group_1.textLeft: Right, and the people we've seen here are all@the same ones I met during the day.
I remember playing board games and@shuttlecock with everyone.
Maybe that's why the dream is like this...?

group_1.textRight: Because of me, everyone's dreams got all@mixed up...?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not sure.@I don't know if that's really the cause...
Yes... For now, let's think about how to@get out of here.
However, it seems there are conditions to reach@the goal.
If you don't meet those conditions when you@reach the shrine at the finish line,
then you'll be sent back to the beginning.

group_1.textRight: But Kyoko and Sayaka met the conditions@and reached the goal...
What are the conditions?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know.
Maybe we'll fulfill the conditions just by playing@this life-sized board game?
Sayaka and Kyoko didn't seem to be aware@of any specific conditions...

group_1.textRight: Well, it's always better to have information.
From now on, let's try to stay on the same page@as much as possible.
Let's exchange information with each other.
More than that, I wanna take a detour@and eat cheesecake...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* If we find a good place along the way,@let's do it.

group_1.textRight: Hurray!

group_1.textLeft: If we need a way to exchange information...
Why don't we try to stop here as often as@possible,
whenever we can choose a square to go to?

group_1.textRight: Are you suggesting we ask Mitama to relay@messages for us?
I don't mind.@It's more fun when it's lively~♪

group_1.textLeft: That's fine with me too.

group_1.textRight: The two of you should come along with us!

group_1.textLeft: I don't think that's possible.

group_1.textRight: Well, if we roll our dice differently,@we'd be forced to separate.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and...

group_1.textRight: And?

group_1.textLeft: If you want to escape this dream, it might be@better not to stay with me.
What...?

group_1.textRight: ...What makes you think so?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry, I have no basis for it.
(Even while I'm dreaming...)
(I continue to repeat time over and over.)
(I can't believe this is just a coincidence...)

group_1.textRight: By the way, haven't you all forgotten about@the dream reading?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right!

group_1.textRight: It seems like something more important@has come up, though.
Just in case, be sure to hear the results of the@fortune-telling too~♪

group_1.textLeft: Now that Mitama's dream reading is over,@should we head out?

group_1.textRight: Yes, let's roll the dice.

group_1.textLeft: I hope we can meet again somewhere.

group_1.textRight: I, Nagisa, will do my best too!

group_1.textLeft: Well, then...
